metadata.name: Nirvana
metadata.description:
I was sitting in front of him
He stared at me and I stared at him

I lit a candle and played my favorite song
I loaded the brush with some color and started painting 
I had no clue where the canvas(he) will take me this time
Little by little, the brush made its way on the canvas and the scenes were created
I believe in the magic of the white canvas
And this time Nirvana, a forest far away from sadness and in distant time and space, was created.

*The final loopable output is generated from my original acrylic painting.
